before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1gbhv","text":"estar preparados para realizar el experimento con las medidas de seguridad adecuadas","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6vej7","text":"en este experimento utilizamos los componentes para crear un circuito rc, posteriormente lo conectamos a un osciloscopio para obtener los resultados","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kbaa","text":"seguir paso a paso el protocolo que se mencionará a continuacion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2rnht","text":"Protoboard","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq2qm","text":"1 capacitor de 10 microFaradios","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a845e","text":"1 capacitor de 100 microFaradios","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgae7","text":"2 resistencias de 100 Ohms","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a5uq","text":"1 resistencia de 1000 Ohms","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98mua","text":"5 cables de cobre","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"v05d","text":"Oscilosopio","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qel3","text":"Fuente","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a9h9l","text":"Primero analizamos el ejemplo puesto por el profesor de como es un circuito equivalente a un supercapacitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1iead","text":"Tomamos los componentes y aparatos necesarios:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alqq6","text":"Protoboard","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4uem","text":"1 capacitor de 10 microFaradios","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37gve","text":"1 capacitor de 100 microFaradios","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lu8s","text":"2 resistencias de 100 Ohms","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u495","text":"1 resistencia de 1000 Ohms","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80ql2","text":"5 cables de cobre","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93t3","text":"Oscilosopio","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"692kq","text":"Fuente","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gvr5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bc9jg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C3EA8FF0EAAB11EDBE357F2BA7437A9A","height":293,"id":370442,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2nb5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2kb5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj2mb5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2jb5e6p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86fns","text":"Tomamos la protoboard y conectamos en serie las dos resistencias de 100 Ohms, estas seran R1 Y R2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ie7","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d4kq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E26E9AC0EAAB11EDBE357F2BA7437A9A","height":131,"id":370446,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2sb5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2qb5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj2rb5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2pb5e6p.webp","width":352}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8053m","text":"Conectamos la resistencia de 1000 Ohms en serie con R1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g78n","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7g8n1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F9550800EAAB11EDBE357F2BA7437A9A","height":152,"id":370450,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2wb5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2ub5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj2vb5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2tb5e6p.webp","width":545}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q07q","text":"Alineado al punto donde se unen R1 Y R2 conectamos el positivo de nuestro capacitor de 10 microFaradios (C1) de un lado de la protoboard y el negativo alineado pero en el otro lado","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30coq","text":"Alineado al punto donde acaba R2 conectamos el positivo de nuestro capacitor de 100 microFaradios (C2) de un lado de la protoboard y el negativo alineado pero en el otro lado","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rjn3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvvp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fckpv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5553E770EAAC11EDBE357F2BA7437A9A","height":285,"id":370454,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj22b5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2yb5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj2zb5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj2xb5e6p.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6D268870EAB711EDBACC637CCFBBC2EE","height":309,"id":370458,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj26b5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj24b5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj25b5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj23b5e6p.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7d3b","text":"Tomamos dos cables y con cada uno de los capacitores, conectamos a la patita positiva un extremo del cable y el otro extremo a la fila negativa de la protoboard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88ijv","text":"Conectamos otro cable desde la fila positiva de la protoboard, a nuestra resistencia RC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkchs","text":"Conectamos en la fila positiva un cable para que sea la terminal positiva de nuestro circuito y otro en la fila negativa para que sea la terminal negativa.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7a8p","text":"el modelo quedaría algo así:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rj2l","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8m0h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8l1i","text":"Comenzamos con el experimento, conectamos el osciloscopio  a nuestro Capacitor 2, con el negativo al caiman y el positivo al ganchito, nos podemos apoyar de conectar dos cables a los polos del capacitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hs48","text":"Conectamos nuestras terminales positiva y negativa a la fuente.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8405i","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f85a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pp8i","text":"Ajustamos el osciloscopio para que nos de los datos de una manera adecuada y visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d1jh","text":"Descargamos el capacitor tomando ambos extremos de un cable y conectandolo a los polos del capacitor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdrt5","text":"Encendemos la fuente y vamos a ver como en el osciloscopio se muestran unas curvas, al momento en que las curvas se regularicen, detenemos el osciloscopio y tomamos los datos con nuestra usb","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qp83","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6c410","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A8B76760EAB711EDBACC637CCFBBC2EE","height":309,"id":370466,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj3eb5e6p.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj3cb5e6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mj3db5e6p.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mj3bb5e6p.webp","width":550}}}}
